Carmela Evashchen

I am a 3rd year undergraduate student studying Biotechnology (focusing on Microbiology and Fermentation) at UC Davis.

I have a strong passion for just about everything. I am interested though in the way that we can use new biological technology to improve our world and our lives.

Currently, I work on school at UC Davis. I just want to be able to share what I am up to on a place that is not Instagram.
